siteMetadata.title: Vienna Hotels
siteMetadata.description:
Enjoy the cosy and charming 4 star hotel Art Nouveau Style of a privately owned mansion-hotel in the heart of Vienna’s elegant and green "Cottage Quarter".
Business travellers as well as leisure guests appreciate the quiet location, the personal care and the Fin-de-Siècle Flair of the property and it’s surroundings.

You can reach the center of Vienna directly in only 15 minutrs by bus, without changing lines.

The close by Türkenschanzpark is suitable for jogging or taking a walk.
